CIRCULAR NO. _23/ 2002

Sub: Facility of access of vehicle upto the aircraft on medical grounds for

Governor of Gujarat .

In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 24/2001 dated 18.12.2001,
Circular No. 7/2002 dated 21.2.2002 and Circular No. 19 / 2002 dated 6.8.2002
on the subject cited above, the following instructions are issued:

2. On medical considerations AAl may provide access of vehicle for six
months in respect of Shri Sunder Singh Bhandari, Governor of Gujarat to
facilitate his air travel, to and from Delhi.

The above instructions shall be strictly complied with by all concemed
